name: Chicken Parent Simulator
description:
This Is The First Time I Have Ever Participated In A Game Jam. So-Yay :)

In Most Simulator Games-You Either Click A Button And Wait For Seven Decades Until You Do Set Thing Again Of You Walk Around And Do A Whole Bunch Of Dumb Objectives That Do Not Progress You Further.

But In This Game-There Is No Such Thing As Waiting Around! You Constantly Got To Feed Yourself,Your Babies By Going On To The Dangerous Road To Collect Seeds For You And Them While Trying To Constantly Avoid Being Run Over By Cars!

More Info Can Be Found In The README Text File That Comes With The Game.
